sentences.sContent: When you summarize, you condense an extended idea or argument into a sentence or more in your own words.
sentences.sCn: 总结的时候，用自己的话把拓展了的观念或论据简缩成一句或几句话。

remMethod.val: con + dense(密集的) → 变得密集 → (使)压缩

trans.tranOther: If you condense something, especially a piece of writing or a speech, you make it shorter, usually by including only the most important parts
